document_name: Decree no. 2010-282 (setting the rules for the National Agency for Renewable Energy Development)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MRT/2010/MRT-2010-12-21-Decree no. 2010-282 (setting the rules for the National Agency for Renewable Energy Development)_a197e8bfc8f21e4c4eec1542e3eec60b.pdf
document_description: This Decree sets the organisational and functioning rules for the National Agency for Renewable Energy Development. It notably determines the composition of the Agency, the duties of its board of directors, and ministries supervising the Agency.
